(Magmatron does not rule the whole planet. He has just taken up a 
portion of it. The Maximals and Predacons still rule much of it. And 
as for the party last night, all I can say is oh man! I don't know 
what it is for you guys in the states, I thought it was like 21 or 
something. But I live in Canada, and the age limit for drinking is 
18. I had only turned 18 in February, so I'm glad he was born after 
February. Man....I ate some cake for you guys like you asked Logo. 
You should have seen my brother....I won't even go there. )


"Whoo hoo!!!!!!" Yelled Fliq as Brix went faster as they rushed 
across Asia towards Tibet, "This is great!"

"Yeah! Watch this!" Brix went faster still, and than did barrel rolls 
galore, "If you think that was good, I've got something even better!!"

Brix pulled up and kept going up...and up....and up! He reached the 
boarder of the atmosphere, and than did a nose dive straight towards 
the ground.

"Okay, good job Brix, now pull up."

"I....I can't!"

"wHat?!?"

"The controls are stuck! We're heading right for the ground!!!"

"We've got to do something!!!!"

"Come on!! We have to abandon the Iron Ram!"

Fliq stood up and started kicking the controls, "Stupid...Why did 
you...This was our last chance....."

Suddenly the machine started making sounds, and Brix put together all 
his force to pull it out of the nose dive.

"You did it Fliq! But no more goofing around now. We're almost there."


The flew for a few more minutes and than came to the remnants of The 
Ark. The landed gracefully. When they got out, the immediatly looked 
for Spears.

"Spears, we got the shuttl! You here?"
